name: Dark Dragonair
author: Kagemaru Himeno
flavor_text: As is fitting for a legendary Pokémon, it has many strange powers, including the ability to make rain or snow fall.

abilities.name: Evolutionary Light
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may search your deck for an Evolution card. Show it to your opponent and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward. This power can’t be used if Dark Dragonair is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Tail Strike
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 damage plus 20 more damage; if tails, this attack does 20 damage.
